ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c && OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Received', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Locked', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Open') &&
OR( AND( ISPICKVAL( D_O_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$500,000"), D_O_Rate_Per_Million__c < 4000), AND( ISPICKVAL( D_O_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$1,000,000"), D_O_Rate_Per_Million__c < 4000), AND( ISPICKVAL( D_O_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$2,000,000"), D_O_Rate_Per_Million__c < 3500), AND( ISPICKVAL( D_O_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$3,000,000"), D_O_Rate_Per_Million__c < 3150), AND( ISPICKVAL( D_O_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$4,000,000"), D_O_Rate_Per_Million__c < 2950), AND( ISPICKVAL( D_O_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$5,000,000"), D_O_Rate_Per_Million__c < 2600) )
&&
CONTAINS(Coverages__c, "Director")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: D&O Rate Per Million is too low
